MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:18pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:10am on 14th February 2021
